arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
Wuhou district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan

feudal vassal/feudal princes, esp. the monarchs (dukes or princes) of the several vassal states 諸侯國|诸侯国 of Zhou during Western Zhou and Spring and Autumn periods 11th-5th century BC/subordinate warlord/local official
Husain or Hussein (name)/Hussein (c. 626-680), Muslim leader whose martyrdom is commemorated at Ashura/Saddam Hussein al Tikriti (1937-2006), dictator of Iraq 1979-2003
memorial hall to Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (many of them in different town)/refers to tourist attraction in Chengdu 成都
Minhou county in Fuzhou 福州[Fu2 zhou1], Fujian
Minhou county in Fuzhou 福州[Fu2 zhou1], Fujian

Houma county level city in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi
(expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control his vassals
pinyin: xie2 tian1 zi3 yi3 ling4 zhu1 hou2

definition: Marquis (highest Han dynasty ducal title meaning lord of 10,000 households)/high nobles

sentences.english: It was, Houllier said with a completely straight face, my tribute to Rigobert.
sentences.chinese: 侯利亚完全不露表情的脸说，那是我对桑治的敬意。

sentences.english: Sometimes, there are over 1000 Africans attending mass.
sentences.chinese: 有时侯，会有超过1000名非洲人参加弥撒。

sentences.english: AKK can all day Hou Shi used in various environments, is not susceptible to interference.
sentences.chinese: AKK可全天侯适用于各个环境，不易受干扰。

sentences.english: Sometimes the men's wives came and beat on the door.
sentences.chinese: 有时侯这些人的妻子会来敲门。
她拒绝了侯德文的建议。

sentences.english: In 2002, Hou's work shifted from research to action.
sentences.chinese: 2002年，侯老师的工作从研究转变为行动。

sentences.english: So Mrs. Hou put down her knife, and the hen was spared.
sentences.chinese: 于是侯夫人放下了她的刀，那只母鸡得救了。

sentences.english: I'm sory to have kept you waited.
Waiting at the front, that won't always be heavy rain and strong waves.
sentences.chinese: 等侯在前方的，不会永远是暴雨和恶浪。

sentences.english: Sometimes you have to pay dearly for mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 有时侯你得为自己所犯的错误付出沉重的代价。

sentences.english: Hou said he, too, felt the window panes shaking when he was at dinner table.
sentences.chinese: 侯还说当时坐在饭桌旁的他也感觉到窗户玻璃的震动。

sentences.english: Miss Hou is my high school English teacher.
sentences.chinese: 侯老师是我的高中英语老师。

sentences.english: While delegates went into the government building the crowd remained standing outside the door.
sentences.chinese: 他们派代表进入办公楼，其余群众都站在门外等侯。

sentences.english: It is suitable for all-weather continuous operation of freeways.
sentences.chinese: 适应于高速公路全天侯连续工作。

sentences.english: There were no other women there by that time.
sentences.chinese: 那时侯根本就没有其他的女人在附近了。

sentences.english: Hour marquis, who loved a fish.
sentences.chinese: 小时侯，曾经爱过一条小鱼。

definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
